body_html:
I checked all the libraries and they are located in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH:

cookie@ceres:~/work/machine_learning/flowers_training$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64

I just reran the model:
2017-06-21 21:58:50.719064: step 550, loss = 1.14 (62.5 examples/sec; 0.512 sec/batch)
2017-06-21 21:58:55.847020: step 560, loss = 1.22 (62.6 examples/sec; 0.511 sec/batch)
2017-06-21 21:59:00.008349: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_ILLEGAL_ADDRESS
2017-06-21 21:59:00.008379: F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:203] Unexpected Event status: 1
2017-06-21 21:59:00.008384: F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:1961] failed to enqueue convolution on stream: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM
./train_flowers.sh: line 27: 13497 Aborted (core dumped) bazel-bin/inception/flowers_

Anything else I can check?

Anything else I can check?
body:
I checked all the libraries and they are located in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH:

cookie@ceres:~/work/machine_learning/flowers_training$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64

I just reran the model:
2017-06-21 21:58:50.719064: step 550, loss = 1.14 (62.5 examples/sec; 0.512 sec/batch)
2017-06-21 21:58:55.847020: step 560, loss = 1.22 (62.6 examples/sec; 0.511 sec/batch)
2017-06-21 21:59:00.008349: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_ILLEGAL_ADDRESS
2017-06-21 21:59:00.008379: F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:203] Unexpected Event status: 1
2017-06-21 21:59:00.008384: F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:1961] failed to enqueue convolution on stream: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM
./train_flowers.sh: line 27: 13497 Aborted                 (core dumped) bazel-bin/inception/flowers_

Anything else I can check?
